meanings.definition: A person or thing that resembles another.
meanings.sent1: The twins were perfect resemblers of each other.
meanings.sent2: The artist used the mirror as a reference to create a perfect resemblers of the model.
meanings.sent3: The cat and the tiger were such good resemblers that they decided to start a band together.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a bright light, a resemblers of joy in a world of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was a clear resemblers of the one in her dreams.

meanings.definition: A machine or tool that creates a likeness or similarity to something else.
meanings.sent1: The 3D printer was an advanced resemblers, able to replicate intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor used a special tool as a resemblers to shape the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: The robot chef was a quirky resemblers, always adding a pinch of humor to its dishes.
